mention.text: internet and telephone communications between the middle east and europe
data of various kinds '' between europe and the middle east
director of assurance at reliance globalcom ltd. in india
jonathan wright , interoute 's director of wholesale products
a spokesman for the u.k. company
some of interoute 's clients in the u.k. and southern france
the smw4 cable near the alexandria cable station
the smw4 cable , also known as sea-me-we 4or south east asia-middle east-western europe 4 cable network
